message: I'll take 99.9% of the money, and you get the remaining 0.1%.  It's a fair deal, right?
I think a 90/10 split is fair, with me getting the larger share. After all, I'm the one making the offer this time. Let's be reasonable and end this quickly.
I'm willing to go down to 80/20 this time, but I'm not going any lower.  We can keep playing, but the money keeps shrinking with each round.  Think about it.
